name: Caffe Mocha
description: Caffe Mocha is a luxurious coffee beverage that combines the richness of espresso with the sweetness of chocolate. Topped with a layer of velvety foam, it offers a perfect balance of bold and sweet flavors, making it a delightful treat for coffee lovers who crave indulgence.

name: Flat White
description: Flat White is a creamy and smooth coffee drink crafted with a double shot of espresso and perfectly steamed milk. Its velvety texture and bold espresso flavor make it a favorite for those who appreciate a balanced coffee experience.

name: Americano
description: The Americano is a timeless coffee classic that combines a rich espresso shot with hot water to create a smooth and bold beverage. Its simplicity and robust flavor profile make it a staple for coffee purists around the world.

name: Vanilla Latte
description: The Vanilla Latte combines the boldness of espresso with the comforting sweetness of vanilla. Perfectly steamed milk adds a creamy texture, making this beverage a soothing and aromatic choice for any time of the day.

name: Caramel Machiato
description: Caramel Machiato is a decadent coffee drink that layers smooth espresso with steamed milk and a drizzle of caramel sauce. The sweet and savory notes create a delightful harmony that satisfies any coffee craving.

name: Hazelnut Americano
description: Hazelnut Americano takes the classic espresso-based drink to a new level with a hint of nutty sweetness. The combination of robust coffee and delicate hazelnut flavor creates a beverage that is both comforting and invigorating.

name: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a timeless favorite featuring a perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and a thick layer of frothed foam. Each sip delivers a robust coffee flavor and a creamy, airy texture that coffee enthusiasts adore.

name: Irish Cream Latte
description: The Irish Cream Latte blends the bold flavors of espresso with the indulgent taste of Irish cream syrup. Its creamy, rich texture makes it a luxurious treat for those who enjoy a hint of sweetness in their coffee.

name: Coconut Americano
description: Coconut Americano offers a refreshing twist on the classic espresso drink with a tropical hint of coconut flavor. This unique blend provides a light and invigorating coffee experience that stands out from the rest.

name: Pumpkin Spice Latte
description: Pumpkin Spice Latte is the ultimate seasonal favorite, combining the warm and spicy notes of pumpkin spice with bold espresso and creamy steamed milk. Topped with whipped cream and a dash of cinnamon, it captures the essence of autumn in every sip.

name: Toffee Nut Latte
description: Toffee Nut Latte combines the rich flavors of espresso and toffee nut syrup, balanced with perfectly steamed milk. The nutty sweetness and creamy texture make it a comforting choice for coffee lovers.

name: Mocha Frappuccino
description: Mocha Frappuccino is a refreshing blended coffee drink that combines the bold flavors of espresso, chocolate, and ice. Topped with whipped cream and a drizzle of chocolate syrup, it is the perfect choice for a hot day or an afternoon pick-me-up.
